summary: This bill provides for interim appropriations for District of Columbia courts and related agencies when regular appropriations are not in place. It ensures the continuation of Federal payments for these agencies, including the District of Columbia Courts, defender services, Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency, Public Defender Service, Criminal Justice Coordinating Council, and judicial commissions, at the rates and conditions of the previous fiscal year. The bill outlines how these funds are charged if a subsequent appropriation is enacted.
